TAG D.feedback: This is the response from TAG D.

Good-form.feedback: The shape of the vase clearly demonstrates craftmanship.

Poor Taste.feedback: Taste is in the eye of the designer as well as the viewer.

Contrasting themes.feedback: There is uniformity in the shape, but there is no depth to this media to imply that it is contrasting with other figures.

AI.feedback: While a modification of prior work, this is still AI genreated.

Shading.feedback: While there is a light source and a shadow cast, shading is a term used for pencil based sketching.

Original Work.feedback: This character is not based on any person, place, or existing trope

Accessible.feedback: The color scheme while high contrast in some areas, loses form in others and has written text unrelated to the character.

Calico Jack.feedback: Calico Jack was a pirate who operated in the Bahamas and Cuba.

Blackbeard.feedback: Blackbeard was a pirate who operated in the Atlantic and West Indies.

Bartholomew Roberts.feedback: Bartholomew Roberts was a pirate who operated in coasts of West Africa, Brazil, the Caribbean, and Newfoundland.

Captain Kidd.feedback: Captain Kidd was originally a Scottish privateer for England until turning towards piracy after unsuccessful pirate apprehensions.

William 'Bull' Halsey.feedback: William 'Bull' Halsey was one of the United States Navy's Fleet Admirals. He was never a pirate.

Horace Hood.feedback: Horace Hood was a Royal Navy Admiral in the First World War. He was never a pirate.

Anne Bonny.feedback: Anne Bonny was a pirate who operated in the Carribean.

Francis Drake.feedback: Francis Drake is an English explorer and privateer who fought the Spanish Armada for England's defence. He was known as 'The Queen's Favorite Pirate.'

G端nther L端tjens.feedback: G端nther L端tjens is a German Admiral who served in the First and Second World Wars, he was never a pirate.

Zheng Yi Sao.feedback: Zheng Yi Sao was a pirate leader who operated in the South China Sea, Canton or today known as Guangzhou, and the Carribean.

Napoleon Bonaparte.feedback: Napoleon Bonaparte was an Emperor of the French Republic. He was never a pirate.

Sun Yat-sen.feedback: Sun Yat-sen was the first provisional president of the Republic of China(Taiwan) and 'Foreunner of the Revolution' in the People's Republic of China. He was never a pirate.

Michiel de Ruyter.feedback: Michiel de Ruyter was an admiral for the Dutch Navy during the Anglo-Dutch Wars. He was never a pirate.
